title: Almonte Higher Secondary School Arunachal Pradesh
summary: Almonte Higher Secondary School is a private educational institution located in Arunachal Pradesh, India, offering secondary and higher secondary education with affiliation to various educational boards.

content.text: Almonte Higher Secondary School is a private educational institution established in 2018 in Itanagar, Arunachal Pradesh, India. The school provides quality education from classes 6 to 12, with affiliations to both the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) and the World Education Quality Standards Commission (WEQSC).

The school follows a comprehensive educational approach that combines traditional Indian values with modern teaching methodologies. Students are prepared for both national board examinations and international assessments, including the WEQSC International Secondary Examination (WISE).

The school campus features well-equipped classrooms, science laboratories, computer centers, a library, sports facilities, and boarding accommodations for outstation students. The institution emphasizes environmental sustainability and incorporates green practices in its operations.

Almonte Higher Secondary School actively engages with the local community through various outreach programs, cultural events, and educational initiatives. The school works closely with the Swami Gyananand Shiksha Parishad Trust to promote educational development in the region.

Students of Almonte Higher Secondary School have consistently achieved excellent results in board examinations and have gained admission to prestigious universities across India and abroad. The school has received recognition for its innovative teaching practices and student-centered approach.
